title.rendered: Sold Out – J Beauty Setting Puff Set

content.rendered:
Ways you can use J Beauty Setting Puff:

Setting Powder
– Dip into your favourite powder and use a patting motion to lay down the product for an airbrush finish.

Contour / HIghlight
– Fold in half around your finger and use a stripping motion to pick up and lay down your product to the angle on the face continue to softly buff out the edges.
Caution: To be safe, wash by hand with our J Beauty Cleaner

excerpt.rendered:
Set Includes:
1 PINK J BEAUTY PUFF
1 BLACK ROUND SPONGE
1 BLACK MEDIUM TRIANGLE PUFF
